channel.title: GScape Errors Coders will be rewarded
channel.description:
Gscape is down with 100 compile errors
You can be a staff member varried by your help.
If you think you can help Message me on msn Runeaccounts@hotmail.com

item.title: GScape Errors Coders will be rewarded
item.dc:creator: @Joe3614 Joe3614
item.description:
@Joe3614 wrote:

boolean pmloaded = false; ^ client.java:8965: class, interface, or enum expected for(int i = 0; i < friends.length; i++) {

Is the first line of the error. I searched for “boonlean pmloaded” and I got what I posted before
(btw the ^ is supposed to be under the B in boolean)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 05:42:51 PM[/size][hr]HEllp!![br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 06:05:32 PM[/size][hr]Yo Javaisnotrecognized Are ya there[br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 06:12:43 PM[/size][hr]???[br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 06:14:17 PM[/size][hr]Common help[br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 06:20:30 PM[/size][hr]You will be severly rewarded if you help.

Read full topic

item.title: GScape Errors Coders will be rewarded
item.dc:creator: @Joe3614 Joe3614
item.description:
@Joe3614 wrote:

public void loggedinpm(){ pmstatus(2); for(int i1 = 0; i1 < handler.maxPlayers; i1++) if(!(handler.players[i1] == null) && handler.players[i1].isActive) handler.players[i1].pmupdate(playerId, 1); //loadpm(1327848063, 987); boolean pmloaded = false; for(int i = 0; i < friends.length; i++) { if(friends[i] != 0) { for(int i2 = 1; i2 < handler.maxPlayers; i2++) { if (handler.players[i2] != null && handler.players[i2].isActive && misc.playerNameToInt64(handler.players[i2].playerName) == friends[i]) { if (playerRights >= 2 || handler.players[i2].Privatechat == 0 || (handler.players[i2].Privatechat == 1 && handler.players[i2].isinpm(misc.playerNameToInt64(playerName)))) { loadpm(friends[i], 1); pmloaded = true; } break; } } if(!pmloaded) loadpm(friends[i], 0); pmloaded = false; } for(int i1 = 1; i1 < handler.maxPlayers; i1++) { if(handler.players[i1] != null && handler.players[i1].isActive == true) { handler.players[i1].pmupdate(playerId, 1);

Whats the problem. This is where the first error was listed

Read full topic
